name: Custom Search Results
author: Quodlibet

sections.description:
Get insight into what your users are searching for on your website and customize the results they see. Do you have an important accouncement you want to show up at the top of your search results? Is there a specific product you want to promote?
Make sure your users get to see it when they search your site.

Major features include:

  • Add Custom Search Results
  • Order Custom Search Results
  • Historical Search Statistics
  • Configure which post types will be searched
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘Custom Search Results’
  3. Activate Custom Search Results from your Plugins page.
  4. Visit ‘Custom Search Results’ > ‘Custom Post Types’
  5. Configure the posts types you want to be searchable
  6. Visit ‘Custom Search Results’ > ‘Custom Results’
  7. Configure the custom searches results you want to be displayed
  8. Add Posts/Pages/Products… to custom searches from the ‘Custom Search Results’-widget on the edit page of each post type.
sections.changelog:
1.0

First Release

  • Add Custom Search Results
  • Order Custom Search Results
  • Historical Search Statistics
  • Configure which post types will be searched

short_description: Custom Search Results helps you put the important results first on searches, shows what users are searching for on your site.
description:
Get insight into what your users are searching for on your website and customize the results they see. Do you have an important accouncement you want to show up at the top of your search results? Is there a specific product you want to promote?
Make sure your users get to see it when they search your site.

Major features include:

  • Add Custom Search Results
  • Order Custom Search Results
  • Historical Search Statistics
  • Configure which post types will be searched

screenshots.caption: Search Statistics - See search Statistics broken down by normal and custom searches
Search Statistics Details - Number of searches by search term
Custom Searches - Maintain your custom searches, and see how they are being used
Reorder Results - Order your custom search results the way you want
Add Page/Product to Custom Search - From the Edit interface, you can add Pages or any custom post type to custom search results
Customize Search Post Types - Customize the post types to be searched.
